Package services

Class ConquestMapReader

java.lang.Object
services.ConquestMapReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdvanceGameMapReader
public class ConquestMapReader extends Object implements AdvanceGameMapReader
This class is used to read the conquest map It has two methods parse and parseContinent parse method is used to parse the file parseContinent method is used to parse the continent
